item.title: China races robots in Beijing half marathon
item.description: The Yizhuang half marathon is the first time robots have raced alongside humans over such a distance.

item.title: China races robots in Beijing half marathon
item.description: The Yizhuang half marathon is the first time robots have raced alongside humans over such a distance.

item.title: Hopes for Iran nuclear talks tempered by threats and mixed messages
item.description: Iranian and US officials will hold a second round of high-stakes talks on a new nuclear deal in Rome on Saturday.

item.title: US Supreme Court halts deportation of detained Venezuelans
item.description: The accused gang members are being sent to a notorious jail in El Salvador under a 19th-Century law.

item.title: US strikes on Yemen oil terminal kill at least 74, Houthis say
item.description: The US says the attack on the Red Sea coast aimed to restrict supplies and funds for the Houthis, who called it a war crime.
